body:
* Add 11.02 and 11.0.1 versions for Mac OS
 * Update `install` method compatible for Mac OS

See also discussion in #21173

Tested on OS X as:

```console
± |develop → origin ↑1 U:1 ✗| → module load openjdk-11.0.2-apple-clang-12.0.0-kvhanir
± |develop → origin ↑1 U:1 ✗| → java --version
openjdk 11.0.2 2019-01-15
OpenJDK Runtime Environment 18.9 (build 11.0.2+9)
OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM 18.9 (build 11.0.2+9, mixed mode)
```
title: Make OpenJDK portable for Mac OS and add new versions
